address: Churchill, Santo Domingo, City Center, Rep Dom.

responsabilities.responsabilitie: Provide responsive and competent customer support within a call center environment.
Learn, understand, retain and regularly update and demonstrate product/process knowledge.
Track, document and retrieve information in call tracking database.
Anticipate, recognize, and respond to aquatic emergencies.
Safeguard guests using aquatic facilities and perform any necessary rescues/administer first aid.
Enforce all rules and regulations politely to prevent accidents.
